wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Dolling Bolton (1841 – 16 December 1906), was a British Liberal Party politician.

response: *Thomas Nelson, 2nd Earl Nelson (1786–1835), born Thomas Bolton
*Thomas Bolton (mayor), mayor of the Borough of Liverpool, England

The North East Derbyshire by-election of 1907 was held on 30 January 1907. The by-election was held due to the death of the incumbent Liberal MP, Thomas Bolton. It was won by the Lib-Lab candidate W. E. Harvey.
